name: phase-1-final-project-digital-memorial-kenya-2025
description: This project is a web-based memorial dedicated to honoring the victims of the 2024â€“2025 Kenyan protests against the Finance Bill. It provides a platform to view victim profiles, submit tributes, explore a timeline of key events, and access related resources. The site aims to preserve the memory of those lost, raise awareness, and foster community engagement through tributes.
author: Shelton Shamola
